author: bencomic

right.text: no, I have the internet myself

left.text: So you deny the hacking signals? Alright. Next question. Are you, or aren't you stealing wifi?
Very interesting. Next question: are you discussing topics that are inappropriate under the Underage Internet Protection Act signed in 1998?

right.text: Homosexuality (or bisexuality), Masturbation, Pornography, Anal sex, Fisting, Felching, Fingerfucking, Have you discussed any of the following on IRC? I already know you're under 16.

left.text: If you aren't familiar (although ignorance of the law is no excuse) I can sum it up for you: Users under the age of 16 are not allowed to discuss or engage in discussions involving:

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 41
